Notes: A platform that disappears and reappears periodically. It always moves into one direction.

Obj_arg0.Name: Movement Distance
Obj_arg0.Description: How far it moves upwards. Default is 600.

Obj_arg1.Name: Initial Movement Delay
Obj_arg1.Description: The delay in frames before it starts moving for the first time. Default is 0.

Rail.Description: Can be registered, although it's never used for anything.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.
